Class Statistics

java.lang.Object
Launcher.Statistics
public class Statistics extends Object
Collects runtime statistics about vehicles and their trips.

This thread-safe helper aggregates counts and timing information produced by the simulator: total vehicles created/exited, per-type counters, wait/road/trip timing aggregates, and per-node pass counts. Methods are synchronized to allow safe concurrent updates from simulator threads and reads from the UI thread.
